title: Fit For A King - Creation Destruction (2013)
description:
[i][b]Artist: Fit For A King
Album: Creation/Destruction
Year: 2013
Genre: [size=200]Metalcore[/size][/b][/i]

Tyler, Texas based newcomers FIT FOR A KING just might represent how that metaphor applies to a band. By forging ahead on their own path, making music well beyond their years, making it from the heart, and laying waste to their peers in the process, FIT FOR A KING have created a thing to marvel at - an impressive independent campaign that exemplifies the way Ã¢â‚¬Å“the gameÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ should be played by an upstart band.
